All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractAccessToken<IDType>
A convenient base class for AccessToken implementations.
AbstractEventCauses
A convenient base class for EventCauses implementations.
AbstractTaskExecutor
Defines a convenient abstract base class for TaskExecutor implementations.
AbstractTaskExecutor.SubmittedTask<V>
Defines the submitted task to be executed by subclasses of AbstractTaskExecutor.
AbstractTaskExecutorService
Defines a convenient abstract base class for TaskExecutorService implementations.
AbstractTerminateNotifierTaskExecutorService
An abstract base class for TaskExecutorService implementations which implements the AbstractTerminateNotifierTaskExecutorService.addTerminateListener(Runnable) method as well as the ones implemented by AbstractTaskExecutorService.
AccessChangeListener<IDType,RightType>
The listener interface for receiving notification of acquiring and releasing access tokens.
AccessManager<IDType,RightType>
Manages read and write access to resources.
AccessManagers
A utility class containing static convenience methods for AccessManagers.
AccessProperties
Defines static utility methods to track the availability of rights of an AccessManager as a PropertySource (with Boolean value).
AccessRequest<IDType,RightType>
Defines the access request passed to an AccessManager.
AccessResult<IDType>
Defines the result of an AccessToken request from an AccessManager.
AccessToken<IDType>
Allows execution of tasks while having read or write (exclusive) access to some resources.
AccessTokens
A utility class containing static convenience methods for AccessTokens.
AffineImagePointTransformer
Defines a coordinate transformation of 2D points (two dimensional vectors) where the coordinate transformation can be described by an affine transformation.
AffineTransformationStep
Defines an ImageTransformationStep transforming an image based on an affine transformation.
ArraysEx
Contains helper methods for arrays not present in Arrays.
AsyncChannelLink<DataType>
Defines an AsyncDataLink which allows to read an arbitrary Channel and process its content to be provided as asynchronously.
AsyncDataController
The AsyncDataController used to control the way the data is provided by an AsyncDataLink and the state of providing the data.
AsyncDataConverter<InputType,ResultType>
Defines a conversion of objects and the TaskExecutorService which should be used to execute the conversion process.
AsyncDataLink<DataType>
Defines a link to asynchronously access a specific data.
AsyncDataListener<DataType>
Listens for data provided by an AsyncDataLink.
AsyncDataQuery<QueryArgType,DataType>
Defines an object which can be used to query data based on a specified input.
AsyncDataState
Defines the progress of the providing of a data provided by an AsyncDataLink.
AsyncDataTransformer<DataType>
Defines a transformation of objects to the same type and the TaskExecutorService which should be used to execute the transformation process.
AsyncElementSink<T>
Defines a sink to which asynchronous element providers can put their received elements.
AsyncFormatHelper
Contains static helper methods to create consistent string format for AsyncDataLink and AsyncDataQuery implementations.
AsyncFunction<R>
Represents an asynchronous computation.
AsyncHelper
Contains useful helper methods for asynchronous data transferring using an AsyncDataLink.
AsyncLinks
Contains static factory methods for useful AsyncDataLink implementations.
AsyncProducerRef<T>
Defines an asynchronously populatable, but synchronously processed producer.
AsyncProducers
Defines factory methods for asynchronously populated synchronous producers.
AsyncQueries
Contains static factory methods for useful AsyncDataQuery implementations.
AsyncRenderer
Defines an object which is capable to render a component asynchronously.
AsyncRendererFactory
Creates new independent AsyncRenderer instances.
AsyncRenderingComponent
Defines a base class for Swing components drawn in the background.
AsyncRenderingComponent.PaintHook<T>
Instances of this interface can be passed to the setRenderingArgs method and the methods of this interface will be called prior to and after rendering.
AsyncReport
Defines how an asynchronous data transfer has completed.
AsyncTasks
Defines utility methods to help with asynchronous tasks relying on CompletableFuture or CompletionStage.
AsyncStateReporter<DataType>
Defines the listener which will be notified periodically by the AsyncDataLink created by the AsyncLinks.createStateReporterLink method.
AutoDisplayState
Defines static utility methods to allow automatically changing the state of Swing components (e.g.: between enabled and disabled).
BackgroundDataProvider<IDType,RightType>
Defines a class that allows to create AsyncDataQuery and AsyncDataLink instances which only provides data until a requested AccessToken is available.
BackgroundTask
Defines a task which may take long time and is to be executed in the background.
BackgroundTaskExecutor<IDType,RightType>
Defines an executor to execute background tasks of the GUI application.
BasicImageTransformations
Defines a subset of commonly used 2D affine transformations.
BasicImageTransformations.Builder
This class is to be used to create BasicImageTransformations instances.
BasicRenderingArguments
Holds arguments usually required to render a Swing component.
BasicTransformationModel
Defines a container for basic image transformations and for the zoom to fit transformation.
BasicTransformationProperty
Defines a convenient class for viewing the properties of a BasicTransformationModel as MutableProperty instances.
BasicTransformedImageDisplay<ImageAddress>
Defines a Swing component which is able to display an image, applying a series of user defined transformations and convenience methods to apply basic image transformations.
BoolProperties
Defines static factory methods for properties having a Boolean value.
BoolPropertyListener
Defines a listener interface to be notified whenever a boolean property changes its value.
BufferedImages
Contains static utility methods for create new BufferedImages and retrieving some properties of them.
BuiltGraph
Defines a whole task execution graph.
CachedAsyncDataQuery<QueryArgType,DataType>
Defines an AsyncDataQuery which caches AsyncDataLink instances based on the input of the query.
CachedByIDAsyncDataQuery<QueryArgType,DataType>
Defines an AsyncDataQuery which creates AsyncDataLink instances caching their results and caches AsyncDataLink instances based on a unique ID provided to the query with the input argument.
CachedDataRequest<QueryArgType>
Defines a request for a data which should be cached if possible.
CachedLinkContainer<CacheRefType>
Defines a container for cached AsyncDataLink instances.
CachedLinkRequest<QueryArgType>
Defines a request for a data when the AsyncDataLink providing should be cached.
CancelableFunction<V>
Defines a task which can return an object and be canceled through a CancellationToken.
CancelableTask
Defines a task which can be canceled through a CancellationToken.
CancelableTasks
Defines static methods to return simple, convenient cancelable task related instances.
CancelableWaits
Defines static helper methods to wait for a cancellation request instead of thread interruption.
Cancellation
Contains static helper methods and fields related cancellation.
CancellationController
Defines an interface to cancel an asynchronously executing task.
CancellationSource
Defines an interface for linked CancellationController and CancellationToken objects.
CancellationToken
Defines an interface to detect cancellation requests.
ChannelOpener<ChannelType extends Channel>
Defines an interface to open a new Channel for processing.
ChannelProcessor<DataType,ChannelType extends Channel>
Defines an interface for processing the data of an open Channel and to forward the processed data to an AsyncDataListener.
ChannelProcessor.StateListener
The interface through which the ChannelProcessor may set the current state of progress of the processing of the channel.
CollectingTaskGraphBuilder
Defines a simple implementation of TaskGraphBuilder which collects the added task node keys and simply passes them to a given TaskGraphExecutorFactory.
CollectingTaskGraphDefConfigurer
Defines a simple implementation of TaskGraphDefConfigurer which collects the added task factory definitions and simply passes them to a given TaskGraphBuilderFactory.
CollectionsEx
Contains helper methods for arrays not present in Collections.
ContextAwareTaskExecutor
Defines a TaskExecutor which is able to decide whether the currently running code is executing in the context of the executor or not.
ContextAwareTaskExecutorService
Defines a TaskExecutorService which is able to decide whether the currently running code is executing in the context of the executor or not.
ContextAwareWrapper
A TaskExecutor implementation forwarding tasks to another task executor an being able to determine if tasks submitted to the ContextAwareWrapper run in the the context of the same ContextAwareWrapper.
CopyOnTriggerListenerManager<ListenerType>
An ListenerManager implementation which creates a copy of the currently registered listeners when dispatching events.
CountDownEvent
Defines event which triggers after a counter reaches zero.
DataConverter<OldDataType,NewDataType>
Defines a conversion from one type to another.
DataInterceptor<DataType>
Defines an interface for intercepting data provided by an AsyncDataLink.
DataRenderer<DataType>
Defines an arbitrary rendering task.
DataTransferException
An exception defining a general failure of transferring a data asynchronously.
DataTransformer<DataType>
Defines a transformation of objects.
DataWithUid<DataType>
Defines an object and its ID which uniquely identifies the object within the JVM.
DelayedGlassPane
Defines the factories for glass panes where one glass pane is to be set immediately and the other is to replace it after the specified timeout, if the glass pane is still needed.
DelegatedAccessToken<IDType>
An AccessToken implementation which delegates all of its methods to another AccessToken specified at construction time.
DelegatedAsyncDataController
An AsyncDataController implementation which delegates all of its methods to another AsyncDataController specified at construction time.
DelegatedTaskExecutorService
An TaskExecutorService implementation which delegates all of its methods to another TaskExecutorService specified at construction time.
DependencyDag<N>
Defines a directed acyclic graph (DAG).
DependencyErrorHandler
Defines an error handler to be called instead of the associated node computation when the node is not being executed due to a failed dependency.
DeserializerChannelProcessor
Defines a ChannelProcessor which reads and deserializes the first object from the specified channel.
DirectedGraph<N>
Defines a directed graph without any solitary nodes.
DirectedGraph.Builder<N>
The Builder used to create DirectedGraph instances.
DirectedGraph.ChildrenBuilder<N>
Defines a builder to add children to a particular node in the graph.
DoneFuture<ResultType>
Defines a future of an already done task.
DoNothingDataController
Defines an AsyncDataController which does nothing and always returns null as the state of progress.
DrawingConnector<ResultType>
A helper class for triple buffering when rendering to a BufferedImage.
ElementConsumer<T>
Defines an action processing element(s) of a stream of elements.
ElementMapper<T,R>
Defines an action mapping a single element of a stream to zero or more elements.
ElementRefIterable<E>
A convenient Iterable for iterating through the element references of a RefList.
ElementRefIterator<E>
A convenient ListIterator for iterating through the element references of a RefList.
Equality
Defines static factory methods for EqualityComparator instances.
EqualityComparator<T>
Defines an equality comparison between two objects.
EventCauses
Defines the chain of events leading to a specific part of a code in the execution.
EventDispatcher<EventListenerType,ArgType>
Defines an interface to invoke specific kinds of event handlers.
EventListeners
Contains static utility methods for listener dispatching.
EventTracker
Defines an interface for tracking the causality between events.
ExceptionHelper
Contains static helper methods for throwing specific exceptions.
ExecutionResultType
Defines the possible general outcomes of a task graph execution.
ExecutorConverter
Defines static method to convert between the executors of JTrim and the executors of Java.
ExecutorsEx
This class contains static helper and factory methods for Executors and ExecutorServices.
ExecutorsEx.NamedThreadFactory
A ThreadFactory which creates thread with names containing a specified string and a given daemon status and also belong to the same thread group.
FileChannelOpener
Defines a ChannelOpener which opens a specific file.
FluentSeqConsumer<T>
Defines a convenient fluent style builder for consumers processing a single sequence of elements.
FluentSeqGroupConsumer<T>
Defines a convenient fluent style builder for consumers processing a group of sequences of elements.
FluentSeqGroupMapper<T,R>
Defines a convenient fluent style builder for mappers mapping zero or more sequences of elements.
FluentSeqGroupProducer<T>
Defines a convenient fluent style builder for producers producing a zero or more sequences of elements.
FluentSeqMapper<T,R>
Defines a convenient fluent style builder for mappers mapping a single sequence of elements.
FluentSeqProducer<T>
Defines a convenient fluent style builder for producers producing a single sequence of elements.
ForEachable<T>
Defines the most basic interface for a collection of elements.
FullQueueHandler
Defines a handler to create a custom exception, when a thread pool finds its task queue full.
FutureResultHolder<ResultType>
Stores the result of some possibly asynchronous computation.
GenericAsyncRendererFactory
An implementation of AsyncRendererFactory which executes rendering tasks in a TaskExecutor specified at construction time.
GenericReference
Contains static methods to create volatile references backed by the JVM.
GenericUpdateTaskExecutor
An UpdateTaskExecutor implementation which forwards tasks scheduled to it to a given Executor or TaskExecutor.
GlassPaneFactory
Defines an interface creating JPanel instances as a glass pane for Swing components (those that have glass pane).
Graphics2DComponent
Defines a convenient base class for user drawn Swing components.
GraphicsCopyResult<ResultType>
Defines the result of a copying to a Graphics object.
HierarchicalAccessManager<IDType>
An implementation of AccessManager which can manage hierarchical rights.
HierarchicalRight
Defines hierarchically structured rights defined by list of right objects.
IIOReadProgressAdapter
Defines a convenient base class for IIOReadProgressListener implementations when you only want to implement some of its methods.
IIOReadUpdateAdapter
Defines a convenient base class for IIOReadUpdateListener implementations when you only want to implement some of its methods.
ImageMetaData
Defines a base class for the meta data of an image.
ImagePointTransformer
Defines an interface for transforming 2D points (two dimensional vectors) from one coordinate system to another.
ImageRenderer<DataType,ResultType>
Defines a rendering tasks which draws its result to a BufferedImage.
ImageResult
Defines an image which was retrieved from an external source.
ImageTransformationStep
Defines an element of a series of transformation applied to an image.
InitLaterDataController
Defines an AsyncDataController which forwards every call to a wrapped AsyncDataController but the wrapped AsyncDataController can be specified later, after construction time.
InitLaterListenerRef
Defines a ListenerRef forwarding its calls to another ListenerRef which is specified after construction time.
InputStreamImageLink
Defines an AsyncDataLink providing images read from an InputStream.
InputStreamOpener
Defines an interface for opening a new input stream for reading.
InterpolationType
Defines types of interpolation to be used when scaling an image.
InterruptibleLimitedWait
Defines a generic interface to wait for an event to occur or return before the given timeout elapses.
InterruptibleTask<ResultType>
Defines a generic task which can be canceled by interrupting the thread executing the task.
InterruptibleWait
Defines a generic interface to wait for an event to occur.
JavaIIOMetaData
Defines the meta data of images retrieved using the ImageIO library of Java.
LazyValues
Defines utility methods to help with lazily initialized values.
LazyValues.PostCreateAction<T>
Defines an action to be executed after a lazy object creation.
LinkedDataControl
Defines a control object for AsyncDataController instances controlling the data retrieval process of two AsyncDataLink instances.
LinkedEventTracker
An EventTracker implementations which stores the causes in a singly linked list.
ListenerManager<ListenerType>
Defines a ListenerRegistry which allows events to be dispatched to registered listeners directly.
ListenerRef
Defines a reference of an event handler which has been registered to be notified of a certain event.
ListenerRefs
Defines static utility methods for listener registries.
ListenerRegistry<ListenerType>
Defines a collection of event listeners which can be notified of events in an implementation dependent way.
LocalEventTracker
An EventTracker implementation allowing to remove all the registered event handlers in a single method call.
LogCollector
Defines a class which is able to collect logs written to a java.util.logging.Logger.
ManualTaskExecutor
Defines a TaskExecutor where client code can determine where and when submitted tasks are executed.
MemoryHeavyObject
An interface for objects retaining considerable amount of memory.
MemorySensitiveCache
A cache implementation which limits the maximum cumulative size of the objects stored.
MonitorableTaskExecutor
Defines a TaskExecutor which is able to provide a few statistical information about the currently queued tasks.
MonitorableTaskExecutorService
Defines a TaskExecutor which is able to provide a few statistical information about the currently queued tasks.
MultiAsyncDataState
Defines an aggregate state of progress of multiple data retrieval processes.
MutableProperty<ValueType>
Defines a PropertySource whose value can be changed by the client code by calling the setValue method.
MutablePropertyProxy<ValueType>
Defines a MutableProperty which is backed by another MutableProperty.
NodeTaskRef<R>
Defines the fully built task of a node.
ObjectCache
Defines a cache of some java objects.
ObjectFinalizer
Defines a simple safety-net for objects managing unmanaged resources (e.g.: files).
OneShotListenerManager<ListenerType,ArgType>
A ListenerRegistry implementation which will automatically unregister listeners once they have been notified by an onEvent call.
OperationCanceledException
Thrown by tasks when they detect that they were requested to be canceled.
OperationTimeoutException
Defines an exception for when an operation was canceled due to timing out.
OrderedData<DataType>
Defines a data with an index which indicates how accurate the data is.
PropertyFactory
Defines static factory methods for creating properties or propery sources.
PropertyPublisher<ValueType>
Defines a method which protects a value when that value is being returned.
PropertySource<ValueType>
Defines the value of an arbitrary property.
PropertySourceProxy<ValueType>
Defines a PropertySource which is backed by another PropertySource.
PropertyVerifier<ValueType>
Defines a method which defensively copies objects before being stored in an internal field and also verifies if the given value is valid.
ProxyListenerRegistry<ListenerType>
Defines a SimpleListenerRegistry which is backed by another SimpleListenerRegistry.
RefCachedData<DataType>
Defines a data and a VolatileReference of the same data.
RefCollection<E>
Defines a collection whose elements can be referenced independently.
RefCollection.ElementRef<E>
Defines a reference to an element of a RefCollection.
ReferenceType
The type of references to be used by ObjectCache implementations for volatile references when the referenced object is not in the cache.
RefLinkedList<E>
A doubly-linked list implementation of the RefList interface.
RefList<E>
Defines a list whose elements can be referenced independently.
RefList.ElementRef<E>
Defines a reference to an element of a RefList.
RenderingResult<ResultType>
Defines the result of a rendering done by an ImageRenderer.
RenderingState
Defines the state of an asynchronous rendering request.
RenderingType
Defines the possible outcomes of rendering method calls.
RepeatingTask
Defines a task which can repeatedly be executed by a ScheduledExecutorService and this task controls if it is needed to be rescheduled.
ReservablePollingQueue<T>
Defines a simple queue from which you can poll elements, but still keep reserving space in a limited capacity implementation after the element was polled.
ReservablePollingQueues
Defines factory methods for ReservablePollingQueue.
ReservedElementRef<T>
Defines an element removed from a collection, but still taking up space as if it was there.
RestrictableNode
Defines a node which a TaskExecutionRestrictionStrategy can restrict from being executed.
RestrictableTaskGraphExecutor
Defines an implementation of TaskGraphExecutor allowing to restrict task node execution using an externally provided custom strategy.
ScheduledAccessToken<IDType>
Defines an AccessToken that will execute submitted tasks only after a specified set of AccessTokens terminate.
SeqConsumer<T>
Defines an action processing a sequence of elements.
SeqGroupConsumer<T>
Defines an action processing zero or more sequence of elements.
SeqGroupMapper<T,R>
Defines an action mapping zero or more sequence of elements.
SeqGroupProducer<T>
Defines a source of zero or more sequences of elements.
SeqMapper<T,R>
Defines an action mapping a sequence of elements to another sequence of elements.
SeqProducer<T>
Defines a source of a sequence of elements.
SerialImagePointTransformer
Defines a coordinate transformation based on a list of other coordinate transformations.
ShutdownHelper
Contains static helper methods for shutting down an application.
SimpleDataController
An AsyncDataController implementation which stores a volatile reference to an AsyncDataState but otherwise does nothing.
SimpleDataState
Defines an AsyncDataState with a specific double value as the state of progress and a string describing the current state.
SimpleListenerRegistry<ListenerType>
Defines the interface to register event listeners to be notified later in an implementation dependent way.
SingleThreadedExecutor
Defines a TaskExecutorService executing submitted tasks on a single background thread.
Streamable<T>
Provides a factory interface for Stream instances.
SublistenerException
An exception describing unexpected failure in one or more AsyncDataListener.
SwingExecutors
Defines factory methods for executor implementations executing scheduled tasks on the AWT Event Dispatch Thread.
SwingForwarderFactory<ListenerType>
Creates listeners invoking the run() method of a Runnable.
SwingProperties
Contains static factory methods for conversion between Swing properties and properties of JTrim.
SwingPropertySource<ValueType,ListenerType>
Defines the value of a usual property in Swing.
SwingQueries
Defines utility methods to help with asynchronous data retrieval in Swing applications.
SyncTaskExecutor
Defines an executor which executes tasks synchronously on the calling thread which submits them (by the execute or one of the submit methods).
TaskErrorHandler
Defines a callback notified whenever a failure occurs while trying to create or execute a task node.
TaskExecutionException
Defines that an asynchronously executed task has thrown an unchecked exception.
TaskExecutionRestrictionStrategies
Defines factory methods for TaskExecutionRestrictionStrategyFactory implementations.
TaskExecutionRestrictionStrategy
Defines a strategy which can restrict nodes from being executed in order to prevent too much concurrent resource usage.
TaskExecutionRestrictionStrategyFactory
Defines a factory of TaskExecutionRestrictionStrategy creating task execution restriction strategy for a particular task graph.
TaskExecutor
Executes tasks at some time in the future.
TaskExecutorAop
Contains utility methods to do task before or after a task node.
TaskExecutors
Contains static helper and factory methods for various useful TaskExecutor and TaskExecutorService implementations.
TaskExecutorService
Defines a TaskExecutor with additional methods to better manage submitted tasks.
TaskFactories
Defines utility methods to implement task node factories.
TaskFactory<R,I>
Defines a factory for creating task node function for the task execution graph.
TaskFactoryConfig<R,I>
Defines a complete definition of a task node factory.
TaskFactoryDefiner
Allows to define task node factories to build a task graph from.
TaskFactoryGroupConfigurer
Defines the configuration of a task node factory.
TaskFactoryKey<R,I>
Defines the key uniquely identifying a particular task node factory.
TaskFactoryProperties
Defines the properties of a task node factory.
TaskFactoryProperties.Builder
The Builder used to create TaskFactoryProperties instances.
TaskFactorySetup<R,I>
Defines a deferred creator of a task node factory.
TaskFactoryWrapper
Defines a task node factory wrapping another task node factory.
TaskGraphBuilder
Defines the initial nodes of the task graph.
TaskGraphBuilderFactory
Defines factory creating TaskGraphBuilder for a list of task node factory definitions.
TaskGraphBuilderProperties
Defines the properties used to control task graph building (not its execution).
TaskGraphBuilderProperties.Builder
The Builder used to create TaskGraphBuilderProperties instances.
TaskGraphDefConfigurer
Defines how to create task nodes, which is the first step in building a task execution graph.
TaskGraphExecutionException
Defines an exception meaning that a task graph execution failed due to a node's action throwing an exception.
TaskGraphExecutionResult
Defines the result of a task graph execution.
TaskGraphExecutor
Defines a executor which executes an already built task execution graph.
TaskGraphExecutorFactory
Defines factory creating TaskGraphExecutor for a given task graph.
TaskGraphExecutorProperties
Defines the properties used to control task graph execution.
TaskGraphExecutorProperties.Builder
The Builder used to create TaskGraphExecutorProperties instances.
TaskGraphExecutors
Defines factory methods to create a task graph executors.
TaskInputBinder
A TaskInputBinder is used by task node factories to define the inputs of the task node they create.
TaskInputRef<I>
Defines a reference to the input of a task node.
TaskNode<R,I>
Defines a task node which can be computed once.
TaskNodeCreateArgs<R,I>
Defines the properties used to create a task node.
TaskNodeKey<R,I>
Defines the key uniquely identifying a particular task node.
TaskNodeProperties
Defines the properties of a task node.
TaskNodeProperties.Builder
The Builder used to create TaskNodeProperties instances.
TaskNodeWrapper
Defines a task node wrapping another task node.
Tasks
Defines static methods to return simple, convenient task related instances.
TaskScheduler
Allows tasks to be scheduled then be executed later by an Executor or TaskExecutor.
TaskSkippedException
Defines an exception to be thrown when a task execution is skipped but failing to compute a task is not considered an error for the whole computation.
TerminableQueue<T>
Defines a simple queue which can be stopped from accepting any new elements.
TerminableQueues
Defines factory methods for TerminableQueue.
TerminatedQueueException
Thrown if a queue was shut down, and still trying to add or remove element.
ThreadPoolBuilder
Defines a convenient build to create an executor relying on pooled threads.
ThreadPoolBuilder.ThreadFactoryConfig
Defines a configurer to create a simple ThreadFactory instance.
ThreadPoolTaskExecutor
A TaskExecutorService implementation which executes submitted tasks on a group of threads.
TimeDuration
Represents a duration between two instants.
TrackedEvent<ArgType>
Defines an event and its causing events.
TrackedEventListener<ArgType>
Defines an event listener for TrackedListenerManager instances of an EventTracker.
TrackedListenerManager<ArgType>
Defines a ListenerRegistry which allows events to be dispatched to registered listeners directly and the TrackedListenerManager will supply the causes of the events for the listener.
TransformationAdapter
A convenient base class for TransformationListener implementations.
TransformationListener
The interface to listen for changes in the transformation applied to an image.
TransformationStepDef
Defines a single transformation step of TransformedImageDisplay.
TransformationStepInput
Defines the input of an ImageTransformationStep.
TransformationStepInput.Cmp
Defines a quick comparison of two TransformationStepInput instances.
TransformationStepPos
Defines a reference which might be used to add a new transformation step before or after a TransformationStepDef.
TransformationSteps
Contains static utility methods related to ImageTransformationStep.
TransformedImage
Defines the output of an image transformation.
TransformedImageDisplay<ImageAddress>
Defines a Swing component which is able to display an image applying a series of user defined transformations.
TriggeredEvent<ArgType>
Defines an event which has occurred or yet to be occur.
UiExecutorProvider
Defines a factory for executors scheduling events on the UI thread of the underlying UI framework (such as Swing or Java FX).
UiReporter
Defines an interface to report the progress of a BackgroundTask or execute other task on the AWT Event Dispatch Thread.
UpdateTaskExecutor
An interface for executing tasks when only the last task is important.
UriImageIOQuery
Defines an AsyncDataQuery which is able to retrieve images based on an URI.
ValueConverter<InputType,OutputType>
Defines an arbitrary conversion from one value to another.
VolatileReference<ReferentType>
Defines a reference to an object which can disappear any time beyond the control of the client.
WaitableListenerRef
Defines a ListenerRef which can be used to unregister the associated listener and wait until it can be ensured that the listener is not going to be executed anymore.
WaitableSignal
Defines thread-safe signal for which threads can wait.
ZoomToFitOption
Defines the possible rules which should be applied when scaling an image to fit a particular display.
ZoomToFitTransformationStep
Defines an ImageTransformationStep scaling the input image to fit the display.
